data.text: Saa ɛda no, wɔbɛto saa dwom yi wɔ Yuda asase so:
Mommuebue apono no
Obiara a ɔde ne ho to wo so no
Fa wo ho to Awurade so afebɔɔ,
Ɔbrɛ wɔn a wɔtete soro ase,
Ahiafoɔ ne wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so
Ɔteneneeni kwan so yɛ tamaa;
Aane, Awurade, yɛnam wo mmara kwan so yi no,
Me kra pere hwehwɛ wo anadwo;
Ɛwom sɛ woyi adom adi kyerɛ amumuyɛfoɔ deɛ,
Ao Awurade, wɔapagya wo nsa akɔ ɔsoro,
Awurade, woama yɛn asomdwoeɛ;
Ao, Awurade yɛn Onyankopɔn, awuranom afoforɔ bi adi yɛn so,
Afei wɔawuwu, na wɔnte ase bio;
Woama ɔman no ayɛ kɛseɛ, Ao Awurade;
Awurade, yɛfiri ahohia mu baa wo nkyɛn;
Sɛdeɛ ɔpemfoɔ a awoɔ aka no
Yɛnyinsɛnee, yɛkyemee wɔ ɔyea mu
Nanso wʼawufoɔ bɛnya nkwa;
Monkɔ, me nkurɔfoɔ, monhyɛne mo adan mu
Hwɛ, Awurade refiri nʼatenaeɛ
